citation_details.title: Episodic memory retrieval success is associated with rapid replay of episode content
citation_details.author: GE Wimmer, Y Liu, N Vehar, TEJ Behrens
citation_details.abstract: Retrieval of everyday experiences is fundamental for informing our future decisions. The fine-grained  neurophysiological mechanisms that support such memory retrieval are largely
